statements: SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles;
SELECT name, email FROM candidate_profiles;
SELECT id, name, phone FROM candidate_profiles;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, email, address FROM candidate_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM candidate_profiles WHERE phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT id, address FROM candidate_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE name = 'John Doe' OR address LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6) AND phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM candidate_profiles WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM recruitment_data WHERE job_location = 'New York';
SELECT company_name FROM recruitment_data WHERE job_title = 'Software Engineer';
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles JOIN recruitment_data ON candidate_profiles.candidate_id = recruitment_data.job_id;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM candidate_profiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT candidate_name FROM candidate_profiles WHERE candidate_id = 'abc123';
SELECT job_title, job_location FROM recruitment_data WHERE company_name = 'Tech Inc' ORDER BY job_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1989-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT company_name FROM recruitment_data WHERE job_location = 'New York';
SELECT id, name, email FROM candidate_profiles;
SELECT phone_number, skills FROM candidate_profiles;
SELECT job_title, department, location FROM job_openings;
SELECT salary, status FROM job_openings;
SELECT stage, interviewer, comments FROM recruitment_status;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT name, email, skills FROM candidate_profiles WHERE id = 10;
SELECT job_title, department, location FROM job_openings WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT candidate_id, job_id, stage, interviewer FROM recruitment_status WHERE status = 'scheduled';
SELECT id, name, phone_number, skills, experience_years FROM candidate_profiles WHERE experience_years BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM candidate_profiles;
SELECT position, status FROM recruitment_data WHERE recruiter_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM recruiters WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT full_name, email FROM recruiters ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT candidate_id, interview_date, interview_time FROM interview_schedule WHERE interview_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interview_date ASC, interview_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE candidate_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM candidate_profiles WHERE full_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT position, recruiter_id FROM recruitment_data WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY recruitment_id DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, location FROM recruiters WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT schedule_id, interview_date, interview_time, feedback FROM interview_schedule WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY interview_date ASC, interview_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM candidates;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM candidates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, department, posted_date FROM job_positions WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT id, result, interview_date FROM interviews ORDER BY interview_date desc;
SELECT offer_date, salary, status FROM offers WHERE status = 'Accepted';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM candidates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, department, posted_date FROM job_positions ORDER BY posted_date DESC;
SELECT candidate_id, job_id, application_date FROM applications WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY application_date ASC;
SELECT interviewer, interview_date, result FROM interviews WHERE result = 'passed';
SELECT id, job_id, offer_date, salary, status FROM offers WHERE status = 'accepted' ORDER BY salary DESC;
